Recommended readings during week of Spring Break

- **R4DS**: Ch. [22][22], [23][23], [24][24], and [25][25]

You should read through these sections and do all the coding examples. 

### Key 

- **R4DS**: R for Data Science
- **QML**: Quantitative Methods in Linguistics
- **QASS-22**: [Quantitative Applications in the Social Sciences (Vol. 22)](https://www.jvcasillas.com/syllabi/589/refs/files/qass_22_applied_regression_an_introduction.pdf)
- **QASS-50**: [Quantitative Applications in the Social Sciences (Vol. 50)](https://www.jvcasillas.com/syllabi/589/refs/files/qass_50_multiple_regression_in_practice.pdf)
- **QASS-57**: [Quantitative Applications in the Social Sciences (Vol. 57)](https://www.jvcasillas.com/syllabi/589/refs/files/qass_57_understanding_regression_analysis_an_introductory_guide.pdf)
- **QASS-93**: [Quantitative Applications in the Social Sciences (Vol. 93)](https://www.jvcasillas.com/syllabi/589/refs/files/qass_93_regression_with_dummy_variables.pdf)
